example.parse: (CONJ و) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS أسدلت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC ستارت) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مشهد) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN توزيع) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الجوائز)))) (SBAR (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الذي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS حفل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_GEN بعض) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الأخطاء) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN التنظيمية)))))))

arg.g: on the award ceremony that was loaded with organizational errors

example.arg: على مشهد توزيع الجوائز الذي حفل ببعض الأخطاء التنظيمية
